title: Remove floating background-music Play button UI

requirements.summary: Remove the floating background-music Play button and any related starting/loading UI so nothing is shown when music is not playing.
acceptanceCriteria: When music is not playing, no floating Play button is visible anywhere on the page.
The previous 'starting' / loading indicator tied to pressing Play is not shown (because Play is no longer available).
The change is limited to UI behavior; it does not introduce any new user-facing text (all remaining user-facing text stays in English).

file_operations.description: Remove the non-playing UI branch that renders the floating Play button, error toast, and the 'Starting musicâ€¦' loading indicator; instead render nothing (null) when background music is not currently playing. Keep changes limited to UI behavior and do not add new user-facing text. Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui and do not change the audio asset path used elsewhere (must remain exactly "/assets/audio/background-dance.mp3").

requirements.summary: Ensure mute and volume controls render and work only while background music is already playing, with no UI rendered otherwise and no new way to start playback.
acceptanceCriteria: If background music is playing (e.g., user previously opted in and autoplay succeeds), the mute and volume controls still render and work.
If background music is not playing, the background-music controller renders nothing (no error toast UI, no buttons).

file_operations.description: Gate the controller UI strictly on isPlaying: render the existing mute and volume controls only when isPlaying is true, and render nothing for all non-playing states (including blocked/errored/starting). Ensure no remaining UI triggers exist for starting playback.
